description: The Simplify Macro Strategy ETF (FIG) is a systematic macro strategy built to provide capital efficient and differentiated sources of absolute return. FIG's portfolio consists of a robust mix of equity beta, currency, and risk-reversal overlays as well as diversifying and hedging strategies such as quantitative investment strategies, managed futures, and proprietary hedges. The fund will opportunistically invest in equity, credit, interest rate, and FX derivatives (listed and OTC) to capitalize on attractive idiosyncratic market dislocations.
name: Simplify Macro Strategy ETF
